name: Air Raid Over Britain
description: Air Raid Over Britain (technical demo) places you in the heart of a small English town during the "The Blitz" (1940-1941). Uncover facts about WWII and experience an actual air raid by German HE-111s.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 480 equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
